subheadings.register: Enter your details to get started

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Username must be at least 3 characters
Password must be at least 8 characters

agreement.prefix: By clicking continue, you agree to our

verified.title: Your email has been verified
verified.description: You can now log in to your account

forgotPassword.title: Odzyskaj dostęp
forgotPassword.description: Podaj adres email powiązany z Twoim kontem. Jeśli konto istnieje, wyślemy instrukcję resetu hasła.

newPassword.title: Ustaw nowe hasło
newPassword.description: Wpisz nowe hasło do konta, aby odzyskać dostęp. Hasło powinno mieć co najmniej 8 znaków.

errors.minLength: Hasło musi mieć co najmniej 8 znaków
Hasło musi mieć co najmniej 8 znaków

messages.invalidLink: Link do resetu hasła wygasł lub jest nieprawidłowy.
messages.tokenIssue: Link resetujący jest nieprawidłowy lub wygasł. Poproś o nowy link.

meta.title: Guidebook | React + NestJS starter
meta.description: Launch your next SaaS faster with a production-ready React + NestJS starter from Selleo.

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ by the Selleo team.

hero.title: A production-ready fullstack template, crafted by Selleo
hero.description: Guidebook gives your team a modern front-end, a secure backend, and opinionated patterns so you can focus on building your product, not wiring boilerplate.

features.title: Everything teams need to start shipping
features.description: Build on a stack that scales. We ship production decisions, so your team can focus on customer value from day one.

authSecurity.title: Auth & security done
authSecurity.description: Email login, passwordless, Google OAuth, roles and permissions already wired up.

dashboardFoundation.title: Dashboard foundation
dashboardFoundation.description: Responsive layout, data fetching patterns, and UI primitives to build from day one.

developerErgonomics.title: Developer ergonomics
developerErgonomics.description: Clean architecture, typed APIs, testing setup and DX improvements baked in.

pricing.title: Simple pricing to get started
pricing.description: The starter template is open source. Self-host for free or work with Selleo for implementation support, custom features, and product strategy.
pricing.additional: Need a dedicated team? Reach out to tailor the stack for your next product.
